revised_title: The Kinetics of Copper Oxidation at Low Pressures
tldr: This study investigates the oxidation of copper at low pressures and how it is affected by factors such as the condensation of oxygen, evaporation of oxygen, diffusion of oxygen through the oxide, and the reaction between oxygen and copper. The research focuses on the influence of these processes on the rate of oxidation and provides a mathematical equation to describe the low-pressure oxidation of copper.
